constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 55 (Tuesday, March 29, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. BUDD:
H.R. 7264.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, clause 3 of the Constitution:
``Congress shall have Power To . . . regulate Commerce with
foreign Nations.''
[Page H3971]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution, Civil Rights, and Civil Liberties.

title: Countering Russian Influence in our Politics Act of 2022
